alert.note: Alert for Montgomery; Toombs; Wheeler (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 12 at 8:46PM EDT by NWS Atlanta
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Toombs, southeastern Wheeler and southern Montgomery Counties through 915 PM EDT... At 846 PM EDT, a strong thunderstorm was near Uvalda, or near Mount Vernon, moving southeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Up to 40 mph wind, frequent cloud to ground lightning and heavy rain. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect minor damage to tree limbs and blowing around of light, unsecured objects. Heavy rain may cause temporary street flooding especially in poor drainage areas. Locations impacted include... Uvalda, Ailey, Alston, English Eddy, Cedar Crossing, Jordan, Charlotteville, McNatt Falls and Grays Landing. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: People outdoors should seek shelter immediately. If you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning. Motorists should slow down and be prepared for possible loss of control due to hydroplaning.
